SEARCH
Package com.APP.Project.UserCoreLogic.phases

Class MapEditor

java.lang.Object
com.APP.Project.UserCoreLogic.phases.Phase
com.APP.Project.UserCoreLogic.phases.MapEditor
Direct Known Subclasses:
PostLoad, Preload
public abstract class MapEditor extends Phase
This abstract class represents the phase where map editing operations can be performed. It extends the Phase class and provides implementations for certain methods specific to map editing.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Rikin Dipakkumar Chauhan

    • loadMap

      public String loadMap(List<String> p_arguments) throws UserCoreLogicException
      Loads a map using the specified list of arguments. It sets the game phase to PlaySetup after loading the map.
      Specified by:
      loadMap in class Phase
      Parameters:
      p_arguments - a list of arguments needed to load the map
